600.description: You can not log in with these credentials
solutions: Write correctly your username or mail

601.description: The token is not specified in the request
causes: Token is not found in the HTTP header
solutions: Configure your header in the following way: `Authorization: yourAuthToken`

602.description: The token is malformed and is not valid to authenticate
causes: Token is not signed by PrognoSports
This is not a JWT token
Unknown data signed inside the token

603.description: The token is not associated to any user
causes: The token is no longer used to log in by any user

604.description: The token used to be fine, but is no longer accepted
causes: The user invalid manually this token
The token is old, and it expired

605.description: An invitation is needed to perform this action, likely to join a Community
causes: You do not have an invitation to perform that action
solutions: Specify invitation code in the URL path

606.description: The invitation used is not valid
causes: The invitation is not associated at the community you are trying to access
solutions: Send a correct invitation in the path

607.description: You can not perform that action
causes: That action you are triying to do is only allowed for administrator or higher community permissions level

608.message: You must send the security token
608.description: To change the password or similar 2-factor authed actions, you must send the security token
solutions: Specify Security Token in the request body with `token` name

609.message: You must send new the password
609.description: To change the password you need send the new one
solutions: Send the new password in the request body with `password` name
